languages.text: Ситуация в Четвертом Складочном стабилизирована, сенешаль Версериан получил указания о дальнейшем ходе его службы.
The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.
languages.original_text: Ситуация в Четвертом Складочном стабилизирована, сенешаль Версериан получил указания о дальнейшем ходе его службы.

traits.locale_text: The situation in Depot 4 has stabilized and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.

The situation in Depot 4 has stabilized and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.
The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.

languages.text: 四号货栈的情况已经稳定下来，韦尔森总领也收到了关于未来该如何服务的指示。
languages.original_text: The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.

traits.locale_text: 四号货栈的情况已经稳定下来，韦尔森总领也收到了关于未来该如何服务的指示。

languages.text: 第四倉庫の状況は安定しており、家令長ウェルザリアンは今後の勤務に関する指示を受けた。
languages.original_text: The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.

traits.locale_text: 第四倉庫の状況は安定しており、家令長ウェルザリアンは今後の勤務に関する指示を受けた。

languages.text: La situación del Depósito 4 se ha estabilizado y el Senescal Werserian ha recibido instrucciones para su futuro servicio.
languages.original_text: The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.

traits.locale_text: La situación del Depósito 4 se ha estabilizado y el Senescal Werserian ha recibido instrucciones para su futuro servicio.

languages.text: Die Lage in Depot 4 hat sich stabilisiert und Truchsess Werserian hat Anweisungen hinsichtlich seiner zukünftigen Vorgehensweise erhalten.
languages.original_text: The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.

traits.locale_text: Die Lage in Depot 4 hat sich stabilisiert und Truchsess Werserian hat Anweisungen hinsichtlich seiner zukünftigen Vorgehensweise erhalten.

languages.text: La situation au dépôt 4 s'est stabilisée et le sénéchal Werserian a reçu des instructions concernant sa fonction.
languages.original_text: The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.

traits.locale_text: La situation au dépôt 4 s'est stabilisée et le sénéchal Werserian a reçu des instructions concernant sa fonction.

languages.text: 4. Depo'daki durum yatıştırıldı ve Seneşal Werserian, gelecekteki hizmetlerine dair talimatlarını aldı.
languages.original_text: The situation in Depot 4 has stabilised and Seneschal Werserian has received instructions regarding his future service.
